numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Females reach out to parents more than males in general.
2. There is a huge gap between females and males who reach out by text.
3. There is a huge gap between females and males who reach out by phone.
4. There is a huge gap between females and males who reach out by video chat.
5. I wonder whether the relationship between parents and young adults affects reaching out.
6. The headline is: Reaching Out: Are young women more attached to their parents than males?
